Name: Inner Call
About the game: Inner Call is a 2D adventure game where you play as a wise orc and help the locals with their problems. For the last 20 years, the forests have been filled with various monsters, which are now aggravating the villagers. Your task is to learn ancient magic and deal with enemies. Use your newly acquired abilities to take on the tasks of the local villagers and take down the enemies. Locations filled with various wickedness and only you are able to give it a worthy rebuff. The magical powers that fill you are given to you for a reason, prove it! Get ready to plunge into a unique fantasy world in this exciting 2D game! Game Features: - Nice pixel graphics - 4 types of magic spells are available to you. - Various unique tasks. - Brutal enemies attacking in various ways
